name: Document Title: ITP-186-STR-SSB-Bridge expansion joints and waterproofing
ITP Description: SSB-Bridge expansion joints and waterproofing
ITP created by: Isaac El Zayat
ITP approved for use by: Victor Mira

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: The Contractor shall supply all expansion joint components including joints, seals, inserts, anchorages, cover plates, waterproofing membrane, drainage system, bedding mortar, nosing, edging and all adhesives and sealants required for the installation of the joint system in conformity with the supplier’s recommendations.
FREQUENCY: Where applicable, for each element
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: The expansion joint system shall match the drawings.
○ Where applicable, the joint sealant shall match the Drawings and installation manual
FREQUENCY: Where applicable, once, within 4 weeks of acceptance of tender

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: The bridge temperature shall be measured at the time of installation and where it differs by more than ±5°C from 20°C , shall be adjusted by the calculated values provided by the designers.
○ For installation tempratures outside 20±5°C, the gap shall be adjusted by ±3mm per ±50°C
FREQUENCY: At the time of installation
VERIFYING DOCUMENTS: ConQA Hold Point Release
4.2 Post-pour Inspection of Expansion Joint Bearing Surface
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: The faces of the concrete under the full length of the expansion joint shall be inspected for the presence of voids and other imperfections.
FREQUENCY: Prior to joint sealant (where applicable)
VERIFYING DOCUMENTS: ConQA Hold Point Release
REFERENCE: IFC Drawings, AC-AR Installation Manual
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: After concrete strength is in excess of 30MPa, the anchor bolts can be tightenedvia the snug tight plus part turn method or with a claibrated torque wrench.
○ Part turn method: Snug tight + half turn
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Aluminium checker plate is installed with M12 Cuntersunk bolts as specified in the drawings
REFERENCE: IFC Drawings, AC-AR Installation Manual, VR 660.04
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Check compliance with the Drawings, installation manual and tolerances:
○ Joint gap = ±3mm (38mm is specified on the drawings)
○ Deviation of top surfaces (step) = 0mm to -2mm when measured perpendicular with a 2.5m straight edge
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Compression seals, inserts and membranes shall be installed in one continuous piece for the full length of the joint, inclusive of footpaths and barriers.
5.5 Final Inspection of installed system including all accessories
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: No visual damage to the installed system
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Joints, seals, inserts and membranes shall be protected from damage due to construction activities and the passage of site vehicles.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Provide record of dimensional measurements to demonstrate expansion joints comply with tolerances as per 5.3 above.
REFERENCE: Work Method Statement, IFC Drawings
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Product warranties obtained and are compliant with what is specificed in IFC Drawings
VERIFYING DOCUMENTS: Copies of product warranties
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Ensure that any NCRs pertaining to the lot / element / Work area that this ITP covers, have been closed in CAMs.
FREQUENCY: Once, prior to closure of this lot / element / Work area

On behalf of Metropolitan Roads Program Alliance, it is hereby certified that the Works represented by the item of work listed have been tested in accordance with the Project Quality Plan and conform in all respects with the requirements of the Contract.
